text: @NYGovCuomo https://t.co/tqWQFhe0d4 The least you can do is not let your "heroes" not get laid off in the middle of a pandemic. @cunystruggle @writersunit @SChenHayes @CUNYAdjuncts_  #cutcovidnotCUNY #Covid_19 , #WednesdayWisdom
